title: The Other Side of Psychology/How Experimental Psychologists Find Out About the Way We Think and Act: What Experimental Psychologists Learn About the Way We Think and Act
description: All the TV and radio talk shows that have adopted the subject of psychology as a staple are really only dealing with one side of that science - the clinical, or "healing," side. In her enormously intriguing book, Dr. Denise Cummins introduces us to the other side of the science of psychology - the study of the healthy mind and its powers.
author: Denise D. Cummins
